actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Veterans.
Committee on Veterans requested executive comment from VA; OMB.

official_title: A bill to provide for a program of delayed reentry and psychological readjustment assistance and vocational rehabilitation for Vietnam veterans.
short_title: Vietnam Veterans Delayed Reentry and Psychological Readjustment and Vocational Rehabilitation Assistance Act of 1981

summary.text: Vietnam Veterans Delayed Reentry and Pscyhological Readjustment and Vocational Rehabilitation Assistance Act of 1981 - Entitles Vietnam-era veterans determined to be in need of mental health services to such services on an outpatient basis as a non-compensable service-connected disability. Entitles veterans whose employability is determined to be significantly impeded by such disability to vocational rehabilitation assistance. Requires the Chief Benefits Director of the Veterans' Administration to provide for the training of persons needed to carry out this program.

titles.title: Vietnam Veterans Delayed Reentry and Psychological Readjustment and Vocational Rehabilitation Assistance Act of 1981
A bill to provide for a program of delayed reentry and psychological readjustment assistance and vocational rehabilitation for Vietnam veterans.
